Title: Let Me Watch This
MoviesSummary: Watch High Quality Movies. Your one stop shop for DVD and BluRay releases.
TVSummary: Collection of TV Shows and Episodes
HistorySummary: Quick access to items you have recently watched.
HistoryClearSummary: You can also disable items being added to your Recently Watched list from the Preferences menu
HistoryClearRecentSummary: Remove all items from your Recently Watched list but remember which items you've watched
HistoryClearAllSummary: Clears your Recently Watched list and resets all items to be unwatched
HistoryFavouriteAddedMsg: %s has been added to your favourites.
FavouritesClearSummary: You can also remove a single Favourite item by selecting it from this list and selecting 'Remove from Favourites'
FavouritesNewItemNotifySummaryNew: New unwatched items were found for this favourite on %s.
FavouritesNewItemNotifySummaryNoNew:
Plugin will regularly check to see if new unwatched items are available.
Last check time: %s
